ModMetaData.name: A Dog Said-EPOE compatibility patch
ModMetaData.author: spoonshortage and kaptain_kavern
ModMetaData.description:
Move all "A Dog Said..." recipes to EPOE benches and remove the skill requirements to be on par with how EPOE works.
!!!!Be sure to put this add-on AFTER both "A Dog Said" and "EPOE"!!!!
